short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click downloads and one-click creation of new GDocs / Sheets / Slides / Forms / Drawings in specific GDrive folders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GDocs Creator helps to create and export Google Drive™ files faster.

If a folder is opened in browser, the popup provides a list of draggable links that can be placed in the bookmark top menu bar. The links are bookmarklets to create files in the folder. Even if a user opens another folder the bookmarklets will create files in the particular folder.

If a document, spreadsheet or presentation file is opened in active tab, the popup shows a list of links for export to other file formats.

Google Drive™ is trademarks of Google LLC.
